name: Dungeon Defenders II - Defender's Pack
description:
The Dungeon Defenders II Defender's Pack comes with Pre-Alpha Access, 3000 gems, 4 Exclusive Hero Accessories, and 2 additional Hero Slots (unlocked in a future update). This Defender's Pack will be on sale for a limited time only! Thanks for supporting Dungeon Defenders II.

Dungeon Defenders II is an Action Tower Defense game, packed with classic roleplaying
elements like loot, levelling, and pets. WARNING: Dungeon Defenders II is currently in development! Expect bugs, missing features, wipes, and balance issues with Pre-Alpha Access.

In the future, Dungeon Defenders II will be free, supported by ethical microtransactions. For more information please visit www.DungeonDefenders.com.

NOTE: A PlayStation®Plus account is NOT required for online multiplayer.



Additional hardware required for Remote Play.

1-2 players
Network Players 2-4
6GB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
Remote Play
1080p HD Video Output

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.
